blogPost.excerpt: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
blogPost.body: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
blogPost.title: Soundescape - Generative 3D audio environments for focused work
blogPost.author: Maximilian Torggler

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免费的环境背景音网络应用。如果你在家工作时难以集中精力，这个工具就是为你准备的。音频是以3D形式呈现的，你永远不会听到两次完全相同的音频组合，因为一切都是随机生成的。
localize.tagline: 专注工作的生成式3D音频环境

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免費的環境背景音網絡應用。如果你在家工作時難以集中精力，這個工具就是爲你準備的。音頻是以3D形式呈現的，你永遠不會聽到兩次完全相同的音頻組合，因爲一切都是隨機生成的。
localize.tagline: 專注工作的生成式3D音頻環境

previous.excerpt: The YouTuber ATM machine. Creator Cash allows you to access YouTube earnings immediately. No more waiting an entire month to get paid. Uploaded a video today? Get paid today! Coupled with earnings analytics, Creator Cash is the financial hub for YouTubers.
previous.title: Creator Cash - The app for creators to get paid without waiting

localize.description: 优德娱乐场w88提款机。Creator Cash 允许您立即获得 YouTube 收入。不再需要等待整整一个月才能获得报酬。今天上传了一个视频？今天就可以获得报酬 结合收益分析，Creator Cash 是 YouTubers 的财务中心。
localize.tagline: 创作者无需等待就能获得报酬的应用。

localize.description: 優德娛樂場w88提款機。Creator Cash 允許您立即獲得 YouTube 收入。不再需要等待整整一個月才能獲得報酬。今天上傳了一個視頻？今天就可以獲得報酬 結合收益分析，Creator Cash 是 YouTubers 的財務中心。
localize.tagline: 創作者無需等待就能獲得報酬的應用。

next.excerpt: Bring documents from everyday life into a collaborative environment built for teams. Video chat, edit files, and work together with your team on an endless canvas.
next.title: RendezView - The endless canvas built for work

localize.description: 将日常生活中的文件带入为团队打造的协作环境中。视频聊天、编辑文件，与您的团队一起在无尽的画布上工作。
localize.tagline: 为工作而建的无尽画布

localize.description: 將日常生活中的文件帶入爲團隊打造的協作環境中。視頻聊天、編輯文件，與您的團隊一起在無盡的畫布上工作。
localize.tagline: 爲工作而建的無盡畫布
